mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.scoperator AS "scoperator", a.scaccnum AS "scaccnum", a.scsitenum AS "scsitenum", a.sprecdate AS "sprecdate", a.scbilldate AS "scbilldate", a.scpredate AS "scpredate", a.sccurdate AS "sccurdate", a.scpredisplay AS "scpredisplay", a.sccurdisplay AS "sccurdisplay", a.scprestartdisplay AS "scprestartdisplay", a.scpreenddisplay AS "scpreenddisplay", a.scrate AS "scrate", a.scloss AS "scloss", a.sctotalq AS "sctotalq", a.scprice AS "scprice", a.scparc AS "scparc", a.scpartype AS "scpartype", a.scpartypet AS "scpartypet", a.sccmq AS "sccmq", a.scctq AS "scctq", a.sccuq AS "sccuq", a.sctotalc AS "sctotalc", a.scpue AS "scpue", a.sccheck AS "sccheck", a.scc AS "scc", a.scapportchange AS "scapportchange", a.scremarks AS "scremarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_direct_receiptinfo( id, scoperator, scaccnum, scsitenum, sprecdate, scbilldate, scpredate, sccurdate, scpredisplay, sccurdisplay, scprestartdisplay, scpreenddisplay, scrate, scloss, sctotalq, scprice, scparc, scpartype, scpartypet, sccmq, scctq, sccuq, sctotalc, scpue, sccheck, scc, scapportchange, scremarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{scoperator}, #{scaccnum}, #{scsitenum}, #{sprecdate}, #{scbilldate}, #{scpredate}, #{sccurdate}, #{scpredisplay}, #{sccurdisplay}, #{scprestartdisplay}, #{scpreenddisplay}, #{scrate}, #{scloss}, #{sctotalq}, #{scprice}, #{scparc}, #{scpartype}, #{scpartypet}, #{sccmq}, #{scctq}, #{sccuq}, #{sctotalc}, #{scpue}, #{sccheck}, #{scc}, #{scapportchange}, #{scremarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_direct_receiptinfo SET scoperator = #{scoperator}, scaccnum = #{scaccnum}, scsitenum = #{scsitenum}, sprecdate = #{sprecdate}, scbilldate = #{scbilldate}, scpredate = #{scpredate}, sccurdate = #{sccurdate}, scpredisplay = #{scpredisplay}, sccurdisplay = #{sccurdisplay}, scprestartdisplay = #{scprestartdisplay}, scpreenddisplay = #{scpreenddisplay}, scrate = #{scrate}, scloss = #{scloss}, sctotalq = #{sctotalq}, scprice = #{scprice}, scparc = #{scparc}, scpartype = #{scpartype}, scpartypet = #{scpartypet}, sccmq = #{sccmq}, scctq = #{scctq}, sccuq = #{sccuq}, sctotalc = #{sctotalc}, scpue = #{scpue}, sccheck = #{sccheck}, scc = #{scc}, scapportchange = #{scapportchange}, scremarks = #{scremarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
